Restrictions

Event Time Information

Leaderboard
League Number {{selectedEvent.LeagueNumber}} Partition Size
Prize Bands

leaderboards_filter.template:
<gs-row>
    <gs-title-block title="Leaderboard - {{form.shortCode}}" padding="10">
        <gs-row>
            <gs-col width="4">
               <gs-form snippet="leaderboards_results?shortCode={{form.shortCode}}" target="filtered__results">
                    <gs-row>
                        <gs-col width="6">
                            <input type="number" min="1" name="rank" value="{{form.rank}}"/>
                        </gs-col>
                        <gs-col width="6">
                            <input type="submit" value="Go to Rank" />
                        </gs-col>
                    </gs-row>
                </gs-form>
            </gs-col>
            <gs-col width="4">
                <gs-link title="Delete All Entries" snippet="leaderboards_drop?action=view&shortCode={{form.shortCode}}" target="modal-small"><button>Delete All Entries</button></gs-link>
            </gs-col>
            <gs-col width="4">
                <gs-form snippet="leaderboards_results?shortCode={{form.shortCode}}" target="filtered__results">
                    <gs-row>
                        <gs-col width="6">
                            <input type="text" placeholder="Player/Team ID" name="playerId" value="{{form.itemId}}"/>
                        </gs-col>
                        <gs-col width="6">
                            <input type="submit" value="Go to Entry" />
                        </gs-col>    
                    </gs-row>
                </gs-form>
            </gs-col>
        </gs-row>
    </gs-title-block>
</gs-row>
<gs-row>
    <gs-row>
        <gs-placeholder id="filtered__results">
            <gs-snippet snippet="leaderboards_results?shortCode={{form.shortCode}}&rank={{form.rank}}&count=50"></gs-snippet>
        </gs-placeholder>
    </gs-row>        
</gs-row>
leaderboards_filter.name: leaderboards_filter

leaderboards_main_menu.template:
{{#if data.leaderboards.length}} Name ShortCode {{#each data.leaderboards}} {{#if partitioned}}
{{name}} {{shortCode}} {{else}}
{{name}} {{shortCode}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{else}} This game has no Leaderboards. {{/if}}
leaderboards_main_menu.name: leaderboards_main_menu

leaderboards_partition_menu.template: {{partitioned.name}} {{partitioned.shortCode}} {{#if partitioned.leaderboards}} {{else}} This Leaderboard has no partitions. {{/if}}
leaderboards_partition_menu.name: leaderboards_partition_menu

leaderboards_results.template:
{{#if data.entries}} rank {{data.identifierName_attr}} {{#each data.scoreFields}} {{scoreField}} {{/each}} {{data.identifierId_attr}} when {{#each data.entries}}
{{entry.rank}} {{ get ../data.identifierName_attr entry }} {{#each ../data.scoreFields}} {{get scoreField ../entry}} {{/each}} {{ get ../data.identifierId_attr entry }} {{entry.when}} {{/each}} {{else}} {{#if data.partition}} Leaderboard no longer exists. {{else}} No results were found. {{/if}} {{/if}}
leaderboards_results.name: leaderboards_results

newPrizeBand.name: Race Events: New Prize Band

player_abtests.template:
<gs-form snippet="player_abtests?action=submit&playerId={{info.playerId}}" target="abtests__{{info.playerId}}">

    <gs-title-block title="A/B Tests" padding="5" height="250">
        
        <gs-row>
            <gs-col width="3">
                Current
            </gs-col>
            <gs-col width="8">
                <input value="{{info.CurrentPlayerABTest}}" type="text" required name="playerABTest" disabled/>
            </gs-col>
        </gs-row>
        
        <gs-row>
            
            <gs-col width="3">
                Set A/B Test:
            </gs-col>
            
            <gs-col width="8">
                <select name="abTest" required>
                    {{#each info.ABTests}}
                    <option value="{{this}}">{{this}}</option>
                    {{/each}}
                </select>
            </gs-col>
            
        </gs-row>
        
        <gs-row>
            <gs-col width="4">
                <gs-submit>Submit</gs-submit>
            </gs-col>
        </gs-row>
        
        {{#if info.submitSuccess}}
        <gs-row>
            <gs-col width="12">
                <gs-alert type="success" message="Success!"></gs-alert>
            </gs-col>
        </gs-row>
        {{/if}}
        
    </gs-title-block>

</gs-form>
player_abtests.name: player_abtests

player_achievements.template:
Earned {{#each form.earnedAchievements}} {{name}}
{{/each}}
{{#if form.unearnedAchievements.length}} Unearned {{else}} All Achievements Earned {{/if}} {{#if form.updated}} {{/if}}
player_achievements.name: player_achievements

player_cars.template:
<gs-form snippet="player_cars?action=update&playerId={{data.playerId}}" target="currencies__{{data.playerId}}">
    <gs-title-block title="Cars ({{data.carCount}} Owned, {{data.blueprintCount}} Blueprints)" padding="10" height="250">
    
        {{#each data.carArray}}
        <gs-row>
            <gs-title-block title={{CarVariantID}} padding="5">
                {{#compare 1 "==" 2}}
                <gs-row>Ofc</gs-row>
                {{/compare}}
                <gs-row>
                    <!-- Show the durability and max durability. -->
                    <gs-col width="4">
                        Laps Remaining
                    </gs-col>
                    <gs-col width="2">
                        <input name="{{CarVariantID}}__Durability" type="number" min="0" max={{Status.MaxDurability}} value="{{Status.Durability}}"/>
                    </gs-col>
                    <gs-col width="4" align="left">
                        (Maximum {{Status.MaxDurability}})
                    </gs-col>
                </gs-row>
                <gs-row>
                    <!-- Show the percentage owned. -->
                    <gs-col width="4">
                        Percentage Owned
                    </gs-col>
                    <gs-col width="2">
                        <input name="{{CarVariantID}}__PercentageOwned" type="number" min="0" max="100" step="10" value="{{Status.PercentageOwned}}"/>
                    </gs-col>
                </gs-row>
            </gs-title-block>
        </gs-row>
        {{/each}}
        
        <gs-row>
            <gs-col width="7" offset="1">
                {{#if data.updated}}<gs-alert type="success" message="Saved!"></gs-alert>{{/if}}
            </gs-col>
            <gs-col width="4">
                <gs-submit>Save Changes</gs-submit>
            </gs-col>
        </gs-row>
    </gs-title-block>
</gs-form>
player_cars.name: player_cars

player_master.template:
<gs-row>
    <gs-col width="12">
        <gs-title-block title="Edit Player - {{form.player.displayName}} ({{form.player._id.$oid}})" margin="0" padding="10">
            <gs-row>
                <gs-col width="3">
                    <gs-placeholder id="details__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">
                        <gs-snippet snippet="player_details?action=view&playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>
                    </gs-placeholder>        
                </gs-col>
                
                <!--<gs-col width="3">-->
                <!--    <gs-placeholder id="achievements__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">-->
                <!--        <gs-snippet snippet="player_achievements?action=view&playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>-->
                <!--    </gs-placeholder>        -->
                <!--</gs-col>-->
                
                <gs-col width="3">
                    <gs-placeholder id="currencies__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">
                        <gs-snippet snippet="player_currenciesLevels?action=view&playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>
                    </gs-placeholder>        
                </gs-col>
                
                <gs-col width="3">
                    <gs-placeholder id="awardPrizes__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">
                        <gs-snippet snippet="player_prize_awarder?action=view&playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>
                    </gs-placeholder>        
                </gs-col>
                
                <gs-col width="3">
                    <gs-placeholder id="abtests__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">
                        <gs-snippet snippet="player_abtests?action=view&playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>
                    </gs-placeholder>        
                </gs-col>
                
                <!--<gs-col width="3">-->
                <!--    <gs-placeholder id="cars__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">-->
                <!--        <gs-snippet snippet="player_cars?action=view&playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>-->
                <!--    </gs-placeholder>        -->
                <!--</gs-col>-->
            </gs-row>
            
            <gs-row>
                <gs-col width="6">    
                    <gs-placeholder id="eventData__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">
                        <gs-snippet snippet="player_event_data?playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}&page=1"></gs-snippet>
                    </gs-placeholder>  
                </gs-col>
                
                <gs-col width="6">
                    <gs-placeholder id="iapLog__{{form.player._id.$oid}}">
                        <gs-snippet snippet="player_iap_log?playerId={{form.player._id.$oid}}"></gs-snippet>
                    </gs-placeholder>        
                </gs-col>
            </gs-row>
            
            <gs-row>
                <gs-col width="12">    
                    <gs-title-block title="Request Log" margin="0" padding="10"  height="360">
                        <gs-chart gs_playerid="{{form.player._id.$oid}}" chartType='data' pageSize='50' query='total_requests'></gs-chart>
                    </gs-title-block>
                </gs-col>
            </gs-row>
            
        </gs-title-block>
    </gs-col>
</gs-row>
player_master.name: player_master

prizeBand.template:
<gs-row>
    <gs-col width="3" align="right">
    Prize Band {{#math PrizeBandIndex "+" 1}}{{/math}}
    </gs-col>
    <gs-col width="3" align="left">
        <input type="number" placeholder="" name="{{PrizeBandType}}Target{{PrizeBandIndex}}"
               class="input-block-level"
               value={{#compare PrizeTarget "==" "undefined"}} 0
                     {{else}} {{PrizeTarget}}
                     {{/compare}}/>
    </gs-col>
    <gs-col width="3" align="left">
        <select name="{{PrizeBandType}}TargetPrize{{PrizeBandIndex}}" class="input-block-level">
            <option value="Cash" {{#compare PrizeType "==" "Cash"}}selected{{/compare}}>Cash</option>
            <option value="Creditz" {{#compare PrizeType "==" "Creditz"}}selected{{/compare}}>Creditz</option>
            <option value="Nitrous" {{#compare PrizeType "==" "Nitrous"}}selected{{/compare}}>Nitrous</option>
            <option value="Car" {{#compare PrizeType "==" "Car"}}selected{{/compare}}>Car</option>
        </select>
    </gs-col>
    <gs-col width="3" align="left">
        <input type="text" placeholder="" name="{{PrizeBandType}}TargetPrizeValue{{PrizeBandIndex}}"
               class="input-block-level"
               value={{#compare PrizeValue "==" "undefined"}} 0
                     {{else}} {{PrizeValue}}
                     {{/compare}}/>
    </gs-col>
</gs-row>
prizeBand.name: Race Events: Prize Band

script_log_level.template:
{{#if form.updated}}
    <gs-modal-close></gs-modal-close>
{{else}}
    <gs-row>
        <gs-form snippet="script_log_level?action=update" target="level_form">
            <gs-title-block title="Script Log Level" padding="10" margin="0">
                <gs-row>
                    <gs-col width="4" align="left">
                        Current log level:
                    </gs-col>
                    <gs-col width="4" >
                        <select name="level" class="input-block-level">
                            {{#each form.levels}}
                                <option value='{{this}}' {{#compare this '===' ../form.current}}selected{{/compare}}>{{this}}</option>
                            {{/each}}
                        </select>
                    </gs-col>
                    <gs-col width="4" align="right">
                        <gs-submit>Update</gs-submit>
                    </gs-col>
                </gs-row>
            </gs-title-block>
        </gs-form>
    </gs-row>
{{/if}}
script_log_level.name: script_log_level

script_log_query.template:
<gs-query name="query">
    
    <gs-query-field id="level" 
                    label="Level" 
                    type='string'
                    values='{"FATAL" : "Fatal", "ERROR" : "Error", "WARN" : "Warn", "INFO" : "Info", "DEBUG" : "Debug"}'/>
 
 
    {{#if query.scripts}}
        <gs-query-field id="script" 
                        label="Script"
                        type='string'
                        values='{ {{#each query.scripts}}"{{this}}":"{{this}}" {{#unless @last}},{{/unless}} {{/each}} }'/>
    {{/if}}
    
    <gs-query-field id="playerId" 
                    label="Player ID" 
                    type="string"/>
 
    <gs-query-field id='ts' 
                    label='Timestamp' 
                    type='datetime'/>
    
</gs-query>
script_log_query.name: script_log_query

script_log_search_results.template:
{{#if results.entries}} Timestamp Level Script Player ID Log {{#each results.entries}}
{{ts.$date}} {{level}} {{script}} {{playerId}} {{json this.log}} {{/each}} {{/if}}
script_log_search_results.name: script_log_search_results

serverClockMainPage.template:
<gs-form snippet="serverClockMainPage?action=submit" target="ph_serverClockMainPage">
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            http://www.epochconverter.com
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Actual Now: {{data.now}} [{{data.nowISO}}]
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Server Clock Now: {{data.serverClockNow}} [{{data.serverClockNowISO}}]
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Server Clock is: {{data.difference}}
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Add a Unix timestamp in milliseconds to set the current 'now' time.
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Numbers less than 13 digits will be padded with zeros.
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Submit '-1' to reset back to actual Unix time.
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="5">
            <input name="epochNow" type="number" min="-1" value={{data.epochNow}}/>
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left" width="2">
            Increase the offset in exact increments using the inputs below.
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col width="1">
            Days
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            <input name="offsetDays" type="number" value={{data.offsetDays}}/>
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            Hours
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            <input name="offsetHours" type="number" value={{data.offsetHours}}/>
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            Minutes
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            <input name="offsetMinutes" type="number" value={{data.offsetMinutes}}/>
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            Seconds
        </gs-col>
        <gs-col width="1">
            <input name="offsetSeconds" type="number" value={{data.offsetSeconds}}/>
        </gs-col>
    </gs-row>
    
    <gs-row>
        <gs-col align="left">
            <gs-submit>Submit</gs-submit>
        </gs-col>

        {{#if data.submitted}}
            <gs-col width="2">
                <gs-alert type="success" message="Submitted">
            </gs-col>
        {{/if}}
        
        {{#if data.reset}}
            <gs-col width="2">
                <gs-alert type="success" message="Reset">
            <gs-col>
        {{/if}}
    </gs-row>
    
</gs-form>
serverClockMainPage.name: Server Clock Main Page

showTopDownPrizeBands.template: {{#each SelectedEventPrizes}} {{/each}} {{#each AdditionalEventPrizes}} index: {{AdditionalStartIndex}} {{/each}} {{#if AddNew}} {{/if}}

updateRaceEvent.name: Race Events: Update Event

user_query.template:
<gs-query name="gsUserQuery" rules="{{config.rawRules}}">
    
    <gs-query-field id="_id" 
                    label="ID" 
                    type="oid"/>
    
    <gs-query-field id="userName" 
                    label="User Name" 
                    type='string' 
                    operators="equal,begins_with,not_equal"/>
    
    <gs-query-field id="displayName" 
                    label="Display Name" 
                    type='string' 
                    operators="equal,begins_with,not_equal"/>
    
    <gs-query-field id="location.country" 
                    label="Country" 
                    type="country"/>
    
    <gs-query-field id='lastSeen' 
                    label='Last Seen' 
                    type='date'/>
    
    <gs-query-field id="pushRegistrations.deviceOS" 
                    label="Push Registration Type" 
                    type='string'
                    values='{"IOS" : "IOS", "ANDROID" : "Android", "KINDLE" : "Kindle", "WP8" : "Windows Phone 8", "W8" : "Windows 8"}'/>

    <gs-query-field id="pushRegistrations.pushId"
                    label="Push Registration ID"
                    type='string'/>

    <gs-query-field id="externalIds.AM"
                    label="Amazon ID"
                    type='string'
                    group="External IDs"
                    operators="equal,exists,not_equal,not_exists"/>

    <gs-query-field id="externalIds.FB"
                    label="Facebook ID"
                    type='string'
                    group="External IDs"
                    operators="equal,exists,not_equal,not_exists"/>

    <gs-query-field id="externalIds.GP"
                    label="Google Plus ID"
                    type='string'
                    group="External IDs"
                    operators="equal,exists,not_equal,not_exists"/>

    <gs-query-field id="externalIds.ST"
                    label="Steam ID"
                    type='string'
                    group="External IDs"
                    operators="equal,exists,not_equal,not_exists"/>

    <gs-query-field id="externalIds.TW"
                    label="Twitter ID"
                    type='string'
                    group="External IDs"
                    operators="equal,exists,not_equal,not_exists"/>
    
    {{#if config.vGoods}}
        {{#each config.vGoods}}
            <gs-query-field id="goods.{{shortCode}}"
                            label="{{name}}"
                            type='integer'
                            group="Virtual Goods"
                            operators="between,less,less_or_equal,greater,greater_or_equal,exists,not_exists"/>
        {{/each}}
    {{/if}}
    
    {{#if config.achievements}}
        <gs-query-field id="achievements" 
                        label="Achievement"
                        group="Achievements"
                        type='string'
                        values='{ {{#each config.achievements}}"{{shortCode}}":"{{name}}" {{#unless @last}},{{/unless}} {{/each}} }'/>
    {{/if}}
    
    {{#if config.segments}}
        {{#each config.segments}}
            {{#if values}}
                <gs-query-field id="segments.{{shortCode}}"
                                label="{{name}}"
                                type='string'
                                group="Segments"
                                values='{ {{#each values}}"{{shortCode}}":"{{name}}" {{#unless @last}},{{/unless}} {{/each}} }'/>
            {{/if}}
        {{/each}}
    {{/if}}
    
</gs-query>
user_query.name: user_query
